name: Raf R's Psychedelic Art Machine
description:
a unique one screen art program that draws art how you tell it to. part 6 of my art machines series. I know a few things are misspelled in the instructions of the text files of this and a few other at machine downloads on my page, I am lazy and the text file program on windows has no autocorrect lol

SPACE to render, R to reset sliders, N to set node X and Y to 0, S to show and hide sliders and seeds, C to clear seeds list, Z to generate seed, and X to load seed.

"cool seeds" text file included in download

ps. this program along with art machines uploaded to this site very closely to each other were programmed at the same time but uploaded months after since I was busy working on school and new games.
